segments.text: I ’ Ve decided to go to the cinema alone this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What has caused you to make such a decision ? Didn ’ t you used to go with Helen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Helen is nice but she talks a lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . That ’ s really annoying when seeing a film .
segments.speaker: S2
